body_html:
@poxvoculi , testApplyFtrl is failing at this.

Without change in tolerance, the test passes if I run in debug mode:
bazel test -c dbg //tensorflow/python:training_ops_test
However it fails with opt or fastbuild compilation modes:

bazel test -c opt //tensorflow/python:training_ops_test
bazel test //tensorflow/python:training_ops_test
body_text:
@poxvoculi , testApplyFtrl is failing at this.
Without change in tolerance, the test passes if I run in debug mode:
bazel test -c dbg //tensorflow/python:training_ops_test 
However it fails with opt or fastbuild compilation modes:
bazel test -c opt //tensorflow/python:training_ops_test
bazel test //tensorflow/python:training_ops_test
body:
@poxvoculi , [testApplyFtrl](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/v1.2.1/tensorflow/python/training/training_ops_test.py#L131) is failing at [this](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/v1.2.1/tensorflow/python/training/training_ops_test.py#L119).

Without change in tolerance, the test passes if I run in `debug` mode: 
`bazel test -c dbg //tensorflow/python:training_ops_test
`
However it fails with `opt` or `fastbuild` compilation modes:
```
bazel test -c opt //tensorflow/python:training_ops_test
bazel test //tensorflow/python:training_ops_test
```
